title: Individual Activity - Produce and Engineering Note Book (ENB) entry for the day's work and plan for next week

quizDescription.text:
Purpose of the Activity
Keeping and maintaining effective engineering notebooks for your professional work will bring significant return to you over your career. This activity is performed every day you perform work on the project.
